original_title: The Erotic Adventures of Bonnie & Clyde
overview: They were the heroes of the thirties. The wild and unpredictable robbers of banks. Their names inspire visions of careening car chases, blazing gun battles, and uninhibited, orgiastic sexual interludes.  Bonnie and Clyde (Gayle Sterling, Billy Dee) Machine Gun Kelley and his wife (Mike Horner & Viper) Pretty Boy Floyd (Don Fernando) John Dillinger and his lady in red (Jon Martin & Alicia Monet)... we've got them all in here, and they're screwing their brains out in a little cabin in Iowa.
title: The Erotic Adventures of Bonnie & Clyde
